review: Very disappointed in how incredibly slow the streaming is.
author: Tory Houston

review: Fantastic entertainment device with a good price. My TV will never be the same. Great for families who enjoy TV and movies.
author: Amazon Customer

review: love it ... very easy setup ... watching movies basically from just out of the box.
author: Dantha C Manikka Baduge

review: I use this every day in my room. I used to have to transport my husbands ps4 every night but now that I have the stick, I don't have to. Great buy!
author: JHC

review: I love how easy the Fire TV Stick is to use. No HDMI cords or laptops hooked up to the TV anymore.
author: Toni
